channel.title: Heath Ledgers last movie
channel.description:
Plot: A traveling theater company gives its audience much more than they were expecting.
Watch the Trailer Below. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6jU3AimFaz0&feature=player_embedded
Colin Farrell, Johnny Depp, & Jude Law all stepped in to help finish Heath Ledgers final film "The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus" Farrell recently had this to say about taking on the role "It was a very difficult decision to make, when I first heard about it I totally freaked at the idea, But it was important to get Heaths work out and doing what I think Heath would have wanted, which was finishing the movie to its entirety."
HOW NICE? Johnny Depp, Colin Farrell and Jude Law gave all the income they received for this movie to Heath Ledger's daughter Matilda so that her economic future would be secure.
Im excited, Hbu?

item.title: Heath Ledgers last movie
item.dc:creator: @Old_Rsc_Player Old Rsc Player
item.description:
@Old_Rsc_Player wrote:

Yes, Its very interesting looking at the preview. However I like how heath ledger played the role in it.
Ive always liked his acting. Since his first movie he made (were he was a gay fag). But still the storyline is
interesting.

Read full topic

It looks like a very interesting movie, not just because Heath Ledger is in it either.

item.title: Heath Ledgers last movie

Plot:
A traveling theater company gives its audience much more than they were expecting.

Watch the Trailer Below.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6jU3AimFaz0&feature=player_embedded

Colin Farrell, Johnny Depp, & Jude Law all stepped in to help finish Heath Ledgers final film “The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus” Farrell recently had this to say about taking on the role “It was a very difficult decision to make, when I first heard about it I totally freaked at the idea, But it was important to get Heaths work out and doing what I think Heath would have wanted, which was finishing the movie to its entirety.”

HOW NICE?
Johnny Depp, Colin Farrell and Jude Law gave all the income they received for this movie to Heath Ledger’s daughter Matilda so that her economic future would be secure.

Im excited,
